raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query: select ref.cd_nom, ref.nom_complet, lb_auteur, ref.famille, ref.phylum, ref.ordre as ordre, count(*) as observations from saisie.saisie_observation obs inner join inpn.taxref ref on obs.cd_nom = ref.cd_nom where ref.cd_nom = :id and ref.ordre = :type group by ref.cd_nom

raw-sql.name: info
raw-sql.query: select count(id_obs) as observations, count(distinct ref.cd_nom) as especes from saisie.saisie_observation as obs inner join inpn.taxref as ref on obs.cd_nom = ref.cd_nom where ref.ordre = :type
